allowClear.description: Allow the user to clear their input.

allowedRegions.description: List of allowed region dial codes. If allowedRegions is [] or null, the default list of all regions is used.

autoFocus.description: Autofocus to the block on page load.

bordered.description: Whether or not the text input has a border style.

defaultRegion.description: The dial code of the default region to be used.

maxLength.description: The max number of input characters.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text inside the block before user types input.

prefix.description: Prefix text for the block, priority over $prefix_con.

prefixIcon.description: Name of an React-Icon (See all icons) or properties of an Icon block to customize icon to prefix the text input.

inputStyle.description: Css style to applied to input.

align.description: Align label left or right when inline.

extra.description: Extra text to display beneath the content - supports html.

hasFeedback.description: Display feedback extra from validation, this does not disable validation.

extraStyle.description: Css style to applied to label extra.

feedbackStyle.description: Css style to applied to label feedback.

optionsStyle.description: Css style to applied to option elements.

selectStyle.description: Css style to applied to selector.

showArrow.description: Show the suffix icon at the drop-down position of the selector.

suffix.description: Suffix text for the block, priority over suffixIcon.

suffixIcon.description: Name of an React-Icon (See all icons) or properties of an Icon block to customize icon to suffix the text input.

title.description: Title to describe the input component, if no title is specified the block id is displayed - supports html.

onInputChange.description: Trigger action when text input is changed.

onCodeChange.description: Trigger action when the selector is changed.

onChange.description: Trigger action when the number is changed.

onPressEnter.description: Trigger action when enter is pressed while text input is focused.
